title: Robotic Skull
summaries: The Robotic Skull is a pet-summoning item dropped by Skeletron Prime in Master Mode with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons Mini Prime, who follows the player around indefinitely.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a miniature Skeletron Prime
'We can rebuild it.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
